panels.title: Overview (updates based on top time selection)

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT db_cluster_identifier, db_instance_identifier, engine, concat_ws(': ', engine, engine_version) as engine_version, log_type, sum(requests) as requests, sum(avg_query_time) / sum(requests) as avg_query_time
FROM "$__table"
WHERE db_cluster_identifier IN (${cluster:sqlstring})
    AND db_instance_identifier IN (${instance:sqlstring})
    AND engine IN (${engine:sqlstring})
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY db_cluster_identifier, db_instance_identifier, engine, concat_ws(': ', engine, engine_version), log_type

SELECT t.time, map_agg(t.log_type, t.requests) as data
FROM (
    SELECT $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') as time
            , log_type
            , sum(requests) as requests
    FROM "$__table"
    WHERE db_cluster_identifier IN (${cluster:sqlstring})
        AND db_instance_identifier IN (${instance:sqlstring})
        AND engine IN (${engine:sqlstring})
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    GROUP BY $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}'), log_type
) t
GROUP BY t.time

SELECT t.time
    , map_agg(t.db_instance_identifier, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.db_instance_identifier IS NOT NULL AND t.db_instance_identifier != '') as db_instance_identifier
    , map_agg(t.host, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.host IS NOT NULL AND t.host != '') as host
    , map_agg(t.username, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.username IS NOT NULL AND t.username != '') as username
    , map_agg(t.database, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.database IS NOT NULL AND t.database != '') as database
    , map_agg(t.operation, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.operation IS NOT NULL AND t.operation != '') as operation
    , sum(connection_ids_cnt) as connection_ids_cnt
FROM (
    SELECT $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') as time
        , db_instance_identifier
        , host
        , username
        , database
        , operation
        , cardinality(array_distinct(flatten(array_agg(connection_ids)))) as connection_ids_cnt
        , sum(requests) as requests
    FROM "$__table"
    WHERE log_type = 'Audit'
        AND db_cluster_identifier IN (${cluster:sqlstring})
        AND db_instance_identifier IN (${instance:sqlstring})
        AND engine IN (${engine:sqlstring})
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    GROUP BY $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}'), db_instance_identifier, host, username, database, operation
) t
GROUP BY t.time

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT t.time
    , map_agg(t.db_instance_identifier, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.db_instance_identifier IS NOT NULL AND t.db_instance_identifier != '') as db_instance_identifier
    , map_agg(t.operation, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.operation IS NOT NULL AND t.operation != '') as operation
    , sum(thread_ids_cnt) as thread_ids_cnt
FROM (
    SELECT $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') as time
        , db_instance_identifier
        , operation
        , cardinality(array_distinct(flatten(array_agg(connection_ids)))) as thread_ids_cnt
        , sum(requests) as requests
    FROM "$__table"
    WHERE log_type = 'General'
        AND db_cluster_identifier IN (${cluster:sqlstring})
        AND db_instance_identifier IN (${instance:sqlstring})
        AND engine IN (${engine:sqlstring})
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    GROUP BY $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}'), db_instance_identifier, operation
) t
GROUP BY t.time

panels.title: * Time History By Thread Id (Exclude null values)
Time History Per Instance (Exclude null values)

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT time, db_cluster_identifier, db_instance_identifier, engine, engine_version, username, host, query_id, query_time, lock_time, rows_sent, rows_examined, object
FROM "$__table"
WHERE log_type = 'SlowQuery'
    AND db_cluster_identifier IN (${cluster:sqlstring})
    AND db_instance_identifier IN (${instance:sqlstring})
    AND engine IN (${engine:sqlstring})
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
ORDER BY time desc
LIMIT 500

SELECT t.time
    , map_agg(t.db_instance_identifier, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.db_instance_identifier IS NOT NULL AND t.db_instance_identifier != '') as db_instance_identifier
    , map_agg(t.return_code, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.return_code IS NOT NULL AND t.return_code != '') as return_code
    , map_agg(concat_ws('|', t.priority, t.subsystem), t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.priority IS NOT NULL AND t.priority != '') as priority
    , sum(thread_ids_cnt) as thread_ids_cnt
FROM (
    SELECT $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') as time
        , db_instance_identifier
        , return_code
        , priority
        , subsystem
        , cardinality(array_distinct(flatten(array_agg(connection_ids)))) as thread_ids_cnt
        , sum(requests) as requests
    FROM "$__table"
    WHERE log_type = 'Error'
        AND db_cluster_identifier IN (${cluster:sqlstring})
        AND db_instance_identifier IN (${instance:sqlstring})
        AND engine IN (${engine:sqlstring})
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    GROUP BY $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}'), db_instance_identifier, return_code, priority, subsystem
) t
GROUP BY t.time

panels.title: * Time History By Thread Id (Exclude null values)
Time History Per Instance (Exclude null values)

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT time, db_cluster_identifier, db_instance_identifier, engine, engine_version, connection_id, return_code, priority, subsystem
FROM "$__table"
WHERE log_type = 'Error'
    AND db_cluster_identifier IN (${cluster:sqlstring})
    AND db_instance_identifier IN (${instance:sqlstring})
    AND engine IN (${engine:sqlstring})
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
ORDER BY time desc
LIMIT 500

SELECT t.time
    , map_agg(t.db_instance_identifier, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.db_instance_identifier IS NOT NULL AND t.db_instance_identifier != '') as db_instance_identifier
    , map_agg(t.host, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.host IS NOT NULL AND t.host != '') as host
    , map_agg(t.username, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.username IS NOT NULL AND t.username != '') as username
    , map_agg(t.database, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.database IS NOT NULL AND t.database != '') as database
    , map_agg(t.operation, t.requests) FILTER (WHERE t.operation IS NOT NULL AND t.operation != '') as operation
    , sum(connection_ids_cnt) as process_ids_cnt
FROM (
    SELECT $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') as time
        , db_instance_identifier
        , host
        , username
        , database
        , operation
        , cardinality(array_distinct(flatten(array_agg(connection_ids)))) as connection_ids_cnt
        , sum(requests) as requests
    FROM "$__table"
    WHERE log_type = 'Query'
        AND db_cluster_identifier IN (${cluster:sqlstring})
        AND db_instance_identifier IN (${instance:sqlstring})
        AND engine IN (${engine:sqlstring})
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    GROUP BY $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}'), db_instance_identifier, host, username, database, operation
) t
GROUP BY t.time

FROM "$__table"

	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00')
GROUP BY db_cluster_identifier
